Cultural Session
Family Session
Business Etiquite & Protocol
Ramadan Induction

Why is everyone in black and white? How do you say ‘thank you’ in Arabic? How do you make Qatari friends? Or, are you having issues communicating with Qataris?

Join Embrace Doha’s cultural session now and learn more about the Qatari culture, custom and history, and the traditional ways of behaving or doing things in Qatar! This highly interactive and entertaining workshop also covers the Qatari hospitality greetings and traditional dresses. Plus, it includes a break for you to enjoy some authentic Qatari food while delighting in our traditional majlis!

Duration

3 Hours

Outline

  • Qatari hospitality
  • Souq Waqif Tour
  • Lifestyle
  • Greetings
  • Costumes
  • Qatari Dinner

    • No. of Attendees

    Min 30 - Max 70 pax

    Who ShouldAttend?

    Visitors eager to know more about the Qatari culture.
